item.title: HMY
item.description: score:21 Chances: Gold prices have surged recently and are trading at near all-time highs. In any market environment, gold and other precious metals stocks are always a solid addition to any investment portfolio as they allow investors to diversify and gain exposure to a number of financial markets.
